price: 55. They (the angels) said: "We give you glad tidings in truth. So be not of the despairing."
arabic: قَالُواْ بَشَّرۡنَٰكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡقَٰنِطِينَ
